channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2228|2024-08-04T07:01:41.088Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Gitlab Authentication Plugin 1.5 and earlier does not perform group authorization checks properly, resulting in a privilege escalation vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2019-10371|2024-08-04T22:17:20.370Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: A session fixation vulnerability in Jenkins Gitlab Authentication Plugin 1.4 and earlier in GitLabSecurityRealm.java allows unauthorized attackers to impersonate another user if they can control the pre-authentication session.

item.title: CVE-2019-10372|2024-08-04T22:17:20.596Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: An open redirect vulnerability in Jenkins Gitlab Authentication Plugin 1.4 and earlier in GitLabSecurityRealm.java allows attackers to redirect users to a URL outside Jenkins after successful login.
